text: Is there a guide somewhere for manually creating and pushing docs for a specific skipped version? I generated the docs and added them to the gh-pages branch, and updated symlinks as needed, but github pages checks failed (and didn't offer any error message at all). Thanks for any help. Creating and pushing a new tag with the same version, but `-docs` appended also doesn't seem to be working. CI ran, but documenter did not update stable and the minor version to point to this new tag. I'm trying again with `+docs`, just in case the `+` is specifically needed.
